lines.text: What's it like when it comes over you? Would you know your own mother? Your parents -- if they were alive, could you spare them?
Are you kidding? You gonna marry a werewolf? What'll our kids look like?
Tell me something. You always use silver bullets?
The few who have survived are afraid to fight it. They're weak. They give in. But not you. Not yet.
If a flower ever spoke to a man, that man would know terror.
